FUJITSU COBOL VS & Oracle Web Application Server COBOL Cartridge

Please read the manual inside this directory for an explanation of how to install the 
COBOL Cartridge on your Web Application Server.

CONTENTS:

COBCAR4.DP - The Digital Paper version of the COBOL Cartridge manual.
COBCAR4.PDF - The Adobe Acrobat version of the COBOL Cartridge manual.
ar32e301.exe - The install program for Adobe Acrobat Reader on Windows NT.

NOTE: DP is the file type for CommonGround Digital Paper Documents, the soft copy viewer 
included with Fujitsu COBOL
